mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.button_name,m.sort_no,m.icon,m.click,m.menu_id as pid,m.position FROM user_role_relation r INNER JOIN system_role sr ON sr.id = r.role_id INNER JOIN role_button_relation mr ON mr.role_id = sr.id INNER JOIN system_button m ON m.id = mr.button_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND sr.enabled = 1 AND m.enabled = 1 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.sort_no
SELECT id,button_name,sort_no,icon,click, menu_id as pid,position from system_button where enabled = 1 ORDER BY sort_no
